label: AB2_hP9_162_ad_k-001
title: $\beta$-V$_{2}$N ($L'3_{2}$) Structure
comments:
(Parth\'{e}, 1993) is the only reference we have seen with a $L'3_{2}$ {\em Strukturbericht} designation.
 (Christensen, 1979) states that $\epsilon$-Fe$_{2}$N is the prototype for this structure. We will instead follow (Villars, 1991), which uses $\beta$-V$_{2}$N as the prototype. 
 The ternary version of this structure is \href{current_web_home_dir/A6BC2_hP9_162_k_a_d-001}{rosiaite, PbSb$_{2}$O$_{6}$}.
